text: Bastutah ami ekamatra e'i uddesye'i rasula prerana karechi, yate allahara nirdesanuyayi tamdera adesa-nisedha man'ya kara haya. Ara sesaba loka yakhana nijedera anista sadhana karechila, takhana yadi apanara kache asata atahpara allahara nikata ksama prarthana karata ebam rasula'o yadi taderake ksama kariye ditena. Abasya'i tara allahake ksamakari, meherabanarupe peta.
